text:
DataFox | San Francisco, CA | Onsite, Full-Time | https://www.datafox.com

DataFox helps industry-leading businesses gain control of customer insights with CRM Orchestration. DataFox's machine learning and natural language processing algorithms structure data on millions of businesses and deliver reliable insights into the workflows where they're most needed.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/datafox

Here are our open roles:

- Senior Backend Engineer: https://jobs.lever.co/datafox/8c3ef28e-ca36-447b-8031-0070b6...

- Senior Software Engineer (Full-Stack, Web): https://jobs.lever.co/datafox/f979dea2-5799-4c71-8d9b-e4c500...

Tech Stack: MongoDB, Solr, Node, ES6, Ember, Python

Please reach out to Alex for more questions! alexms@datafox.com
